descriptionHtml:
Lynette_Follower
■About
Add the Follower Lynette.She is Essential.
Thisfollower is stand-alone.
She is in The Winking Skeever.
She is necromancer.Summon the undead and use the dark magic.
Use NMM　or Manually introduced.
Recommended MOD
FaceLight
Required DLC
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
